page.title: 07WINKLEIGH FAIR WEEK
page.content: {FAIR }THE MOST IMPORTANT ANNUAL TRADITIONAL EVENT IS WINKLEIGH FAIR. THIS TAKES PLACE FOR ONE WEEK STARTING ON THE FIRST SUNDAY ON OR AFTER JULY 7TH.IT STARTS WITH A CHURCH SERVICE AND THE CROWNING OF THE FAIR QUEEN. THIS TAKES PLACE IN THE SQUARE AND MOST OF THE VILLAGERS ATTEND.DURING THE FOLLOWING WEEK THERE IS A KNITTING COMPETITION FOR CHARITY ON MONDAY, TUESDAY THE CHURCH FETE,THURSDAY WELL DRESSING AND CLAY PIGEON SHOOT, THURSDAY A GYMKANA, FRIDAY THE W.I. FLOWER SHOW AND EVENING TREASURE HUNT. ON SATURDAY FANCY DRESS COMPETITIONS TAKE PLACE DURING THE AFTERNOON FOR CHILDREN AND EVENING FOR ADULTS.SPORTS BEGINS AT 6PM.THE ROUND THE VILLAGE RACE IS AT 7PM AND IS WELL KNOWN IN NORTH DEVON.FAIR WEEK ENDS WITH A DANCE IN THE SQUARE.
